title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown when trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not set, as per the template requirements. It should not show an error.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Add a table report item
2. Do not set the dataset
3. Try creating a new table group
